name: Shoooter (developed with a free cross-platform game engine, RCBasic)
name_original: Shoooter (developed with a free cross-platform game engine, RCBasic)
description:
It is a nice shooting game  and an open-source game. If you are interested in the cross-platform game engine RCBasic. You may want to download the source code of the game. Further discussion and the source code of the game can be found at the following webpage address. Join our discussion!
http://rcbasic.freeforums.net/post/2625/thread

RCBasic is a free game engine.  In my opinion, the engine is a good learning opportunity for amateur programmers. It is also suitable for school courses. The language has a simple structure and it is very easy to learn and use. However, programs with the same features of some advanced programming languages can be created with this language. It is a kind of language that allows the creation of games with great graphics performance,  Many young students will like to learn programming with it.  A lot of teachers will  also feel comfortable in teaching programming  with it.

The game engine RCBasic can be downloaded here:
https://n00bcode.itch.io/rcbasic-basic-programming-language-for-games
